definition: displaying superhuman strength or power, (Southern regional intensive) very
details:
adjective
- displaying superhuman strength or power
= synonyms: herculean
- having great power or force or potency or effect
= example: having great power or force or potency or effect
- having great influence
= synonyms: potent
- (of a person) possessing physical strength and weight
= example: (of a person) possessing physical strength and weight
= synonyms: hefty
- strong enough to knock down or overwhelm
= synonyms: knock-down
adverb
- (Southern regional intensive) very
= synonyms: mighty
